Header.title: Tunisia Djerid Salt
Header.paragraph: Pure, Organic, and Harvested in North Africa

About.paragraph: In the vast, sun-drenched plains of Chott el Djerid, we hand-harvest premium salt using traditional methods passed down for generations. Our salt is more than just a product — it is a reflection of Tunisia’s heritage, nature’s purity, and North African resilience. From the pink-hued waters of the desert lake to the mineral-rich salt mounds, each grain tells a story. We are committed to eco-friendly harvesting, fair trade, and sharing the unique richness of the Djerid region with the world.
Why: Pure & Natural from the Djerid Desert

Features.title: 100% Organic
Features.text: No additives, no processing—just pure desert salt.

Features.title: Naturally Pure
Features.text: Untouched by industrial or natural pollution — harvested from pristine desert salt beds.

Features.title: Rich in Minerals
Features.text: Contains essential minerals from the Djerid salt flats.
